system.note: Can be fired in either "Explosive Crescendo" or "Hail of Noise" Mode. Does not have ammo or need to reload, but must be connected to a power source, typically the power pack of the wearer's power armour.

description.value:
Special: Devastating (1), Storm

Note: Can be fired in either "Explosive Crescendo" or "Hail of Noise" Mode. Does not have ammo or need to reload, but must be connected to a power source, typically the power pack of the wearer's power armour.
